title: 09/17 Fantasy Football Podcast: Week 2 Recap - Carson Time!
description:
Chris Carson (1:05) steals the show in Seattle and some TE injuries (4:40) will have Fantasy owners hitting the Waiver Wire. What else did we notice in Week 2? ... Winners (8:15) including Carlos Hyde, C.J. Anderson and Buck Allen, losers (19:05) including Isaiah Crowell and DeMarco Murray. Then it's on to the Worryometer (33:35) for SEA's offense, Le'Veon Bell, Terrelle Pryor and more ... We go through every game (44:00) and discuss J.J. Nelson, Carson Wentz, Marcus Mariota's struggles, CAR RBs, etc. ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
